mapper.insert: insert into s_gallery(STUDY_NO, LIST_NAME, G_NO, G_WRITER, G_WRITE_DAY, G_TITLE , G_CONTENT , G_IMGNAME , G_LIKE , G_HIT ) values (3, '갤러리', '10', '창진', sysdate, #{g_title}, #{g_content}, #{imageName}, 0, 0 )
mapper.select: select STUDY_NO as study_no, LIST_NAME as list_name, G_NO as g_no, G_WRITER as g_writer, G_WRITE_DAY as g_write_day, G_TITLE as g_title, G_CONTENT as g_content, G_IMGNAME as imageName, G_LIKE as g_like, G_HIT as g_hit from s_gallery
